title: World-Wide
text:
Merck and partner Ridgeback said their experimental Covid-19 pill helped prevent high-risk people early in the course of the disease in a pivotal study from becoming seriously ill and dying.

All eligible students in California will be required to get vaccinated against Covid-19, Gov. Newsom said, marking the first such mandate in a U.S. state.

The Delta variant's deadly surge through the U.S. is leveling off, another sign that the nation's most recent wave has crested.

---

The humanitarian crisis in Ethiopia's Tigray region continues to escalate, with only a fraction of needed aid allowed to enter, the United Nations said.

---

German Catholic bishops and lay leaders called for their church to bless same-sex relationships, challenging a Vatican ban.

---

Died: John Rigas, 96, Adelphia founder who went to prison for fraud.
